td.content: s:a male aged 26 Ys describes Body Aches. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month denies any smoking o:Height 75 in, Weight 124 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed acetaminophen - 650 mg up to 4x day, and ordered RF, Knee XRY.

s:pt presents with Body Aches x 7 days. patient is a 28 YO m. o:Height 76 in, Weight 128 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed capsaicin 0.025% - 60 g topical, 3-4 x per day to affected area(s), and ordered CRP, ANA, anti-CCP.
